Axebreaker 1.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against an axe user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Axebreaker 2.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against an axe user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Axebreaker 3.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against an axe user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

B Tomebreaker 2.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a blue tome user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

B Tomebreaker 3.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a blue tome user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Bowbreaker 2.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a bow user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Bowbreaker 3.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a bow user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Brash Assault 1.effect: Unit automatically makes a followup when at HP ≤ 30% and attacking a foe that can counter.

Brash Assault 2.effect: Unit automatically makes a followup when at HP ≤ 40% and attacking a foe that can counter.

Brash Assault 3.effect: Unit automatically makes a followup when at HP ≤ 50% and attacking a foe that can counter.

Daggerbreaker 3.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a dagger user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Desperation 1.effect: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 25%, followup attacks occur immediately after unit's attack.

Desperation 2.effect: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 50%, followup attacks occur immediately after unit's attack.

Desperation 3.effect: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 75%, followup attacks occur immediately after unit's attack.

Drag Back.effect: If unit initiates attack, the unit moves 1 space away after combat. Foe moves into unit's previous space.

Escape Route 1.effect: Enables unit whose own HP is ≤ 30% to warp adjacent to any ally.

Escape Route 2.effect: Enables unit whose own HP is ≤ 40% to warp adjacent to any ally.

Escape Route 3.effect: Enables unit whose own HP is ≤ 50% to warp adjacent to any ally.

G Tomebreaker 1.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a green tome user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

G Tomebreaker 2.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a green tome user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

G Tomebreaker 3.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a green tome user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Knock Back.effect: If unit initiates attack, foe is moved 1 space away after combat.

Lancebreaker 1.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a lance user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Lancebreaker 2.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a lance user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Lancebreaker 3.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a lance user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Live to Serve 1.effect: When healing allies with a staff, unit also recovers 50% of the HP restored.

Live to Serve 2.effect: When healing allies with a staff, unit also recovers 75% of the HP restored.

Live to Serve 3.effect: When healing allies with a staff, unit also recovers the same amount.

Lunge.effect: If unit initiates attack, after combat, unit and targeted foe swap places.

Obstruct 1.effect: Prevents foes from moving through adjacent spaces while this unit's HP ≥ 90%. (No effect on foes with a Pass skill.)

Obstruct 2.effect: Prevents foes from moving through adjacent spaces while this unit's HP ≥ 70%. (No effect on foes with a Pass skill.)

Obstruct 3.effect: Prevents foes from moving through adjacent spaces while this unit's HP ≥ 50%. (No effect on foes with a Pass skill.)

Pass 1.effect: Units can pass through foes if its own HP ≥ 75%.

Pass 2.effect: Units can pass through foes if its own HP ≥ 50%.

Pass 3.effect: Units can pass through foes if its own HP ≥ 25%.

Poison Strike 1.effect: Inflicts 4 damage to foe after any combat this unit initiates.

Poison Strike 2.effect: Inflicts 7 damage to foe after any combat this unit initiates.

Poison Strike 3.effect: Inflicts 10 damage to foe after any combat this unit initiates.

Quick Riposte 1.effect: Unit automatically makes a followup attack if attacked at HP ≥ 90%.

Quick Riposte 2.effect: Unit automatically makes a followup attack if attacked at HP ≥ 80%.

Quick Riposte 3.effect: Unit automatically makes a followup attack if attacked at HP ≥ 70%.

R Tomebreaker 1.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a red tome user, unit makes a followup attack and foe cannot.

Renewal 2.effect: At the start of every third turn, restores 10 HP.

Renewal 3.effect: At the start of every second turn, restores 10 HP.
